column4: you somehow set the default open folder.. tobe sudo nautilus?
I don't believe I did.  It seems to be a side effect of upgrading from Natty to Oneiric.
i tend to reibstall windiws without upgradeing.. :-)
I don't even upgrade my toaster.  Every morning it's the same: reformat, install the new OS, put the bread in, toast it, butter it...
